ordered.description: Ordered splits improve performance and are required for certain splits (e.g. KingsPass).

endTriggeringAutosplit.description: Whether to end time at the last autosplit. Set this to false for full-game runs, where time ends on a final cutscene.

categoryName.description: The category name on the associated speedrun.com board.

gameName.description: The game name on the associated speedrun.com board.

variables.description: Additional optional info to describe your run

patch.description: The version/build number of the version of the game you're playing.
